name: Takashi Inui
content: INUI Takashi 日本語 at Mt. Tsukuba 乾 孝司(INUI Takashi) University of Tsukuba Graduate School of Systems and Information Engineering Department of Computer Science Associate Professor inui -at- cs.tsukuba.ac.jp Publications Research interests Natural Language Processing and Text Mining Sentiment Analysis and Opinion Mining study links Information Extraction from Web/Blog data See also NLP on the Web Lab. Lecture lecture inui -at- cs.tsukuba.ac.jp
